about_text: Welcome to the new website of Clemar - your reliable partner in the field of professional cleaning! Formerly known as Clean Market with over 10 years of experience, we are pleased to introduce you to our updated and reimagined identity - Clemar. With us you get not just products, but guaranteed quality and professionalism in every detail. Clemar is a leading distributor of more than 25 global brands in Uzbekistan, specializing in cleaning equipment. Our range includes professional vacuum cleaners for dry and wet cleaning, as well as high quality paper, napkins and paper towels. But, of course, our main focus is scrubber dryers. At Clemar you will find a wide selection of cordless and corded scrubber dryers from renowned brands from all over the world. Our experience and professionalism allow us to offer you only the best solutions for maintaining cleanliness in any environment. We are proud that we already cooperate with well-known companies, and our reputation in Uzbekistan confirms our place among the best. Clemar is not just a supplier, it is your reliable partner in the fight for cleanliness and order. Join us, choose Clemar, and provide your business with the highest standard of cleaning and hygiene.
Clemar: Clemar - Distributor of more than 25 world brands in Uzbekistan
